sentences.en: England intend fielding their strongest team in next month's World Youth Championship.
sentences.cn: 英格兰意欲在下月的世界青年锦标赛中推出他们的最强阵容。

sentences.en: He seems to intend mischief.
sentences.cn: 看来他想捣蛋.

sentences.en: How long do you intend to stay with the firm?
sentences.cn: 你准备在公司干多久?

sentences.en: I didn't intend to denigrate her achievements.
sentences.cn: 我不是想贬低她的成绩。

sentences.en: I fully intended (= definitely intended) to pay for the damage.
sentences.cn: 我确实诚心想赔偿损失。

sentences.en: I intend to rewrite the story for younger children.
sentences.cn: 我想为年纪更小的孩子改写这篇故事。

sentences.en: I intend to right that wrong.
sentences.cn: 我打算纠正那个错误。

sentences.en: I intend to transfer the property to my son.
sentences.cn: 我想把这笔财产转给我儿子.

sentences.en: I understand by your remark that you intend to leave the firm.
sentences.cn: 从你的言谈话语中,我看出你打算离开那个公司.

sentences.en: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.cn: 通过我们这些努力，我们想要更聪明地开展工作，而并不降低我们的标准或服务的质量。

sentences.en: It's only fair to let her know that you intend to apply.
sentences.cn: 告诉她你打算申请，这才算公平嘛。

sentences.en: Maybe he intends to leave her.
sentences.cn: 也许他打算离开她。

sentences.en: Oddly enough, that is precisely what I intend.
sentences.cn: 说也奇怪， 那正是我的打算。

sentences.en: She doesn't intend to be repaid to her kindness.
sentences.cn: 她不图回报她的好心.

sentences.en: They intend to allocate more places to mature students this year.
sentences.cn: 今年他们打算给成人学生提供更多的名额。

sentences.en: They intend to be an army of light against the onslaught of darkness.
sentences.cn: 他们打算成为一支光明之师对抗黑暗军团的猛烈进攻。

sentences.en: They intend to claim for damages against the three doctors.
sentences.cn: 他们打算向那3位医生索要损害赔偿。

sentences.en: They intend to get their way, by hook or by crook.
sentences.cn: 为达到目的，他们不择手段。

sentences.en: We do not intend to be drawn into the internal strife.
sentences.cn: 我们不想卷入内乱之中.

sentences.en: We have the initiative; we intend to keep it.
sentences.cn: 我们拥有主动权；我们不打算放弃它。

sentences.en: What do you intend doing when you get to this place?
sentences.cn: 你打算到这里干什么？

sentences.en: What exactly did you intend by that remark?
sentences.cn: 你那句话到底想说什么？

words.tran_cn: 故意的，有意的；打算中的

phrases.tran_cn: 希望有或接到；打算成为……

trans.tran_en: If you intend to do something, you have decided or planned to do it.

trans.tran_cn: 想要， 打算， 计划； 打算使…， 想让…做
trans.tran_en: If you intend to do something, you have decided or planned to do it
